title: Generate a Comparative Market Analysis (CMA)
description: A prospective seller wants to know what their home is worth. The agent must prepare a CMA to propose a listing price.

tasks.description: Find 3-5 comparable properties that are currently for sale, pending, and recently sold in the same neighborhood.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a list of relevant comparable properties.

tasks.description: Analyze the comps, making adjustments for key differences (e.g., square footage, condition, upgrades).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines an adjusted value range for the subject property.

tasks.description: Generate a CMA report that visually presents the data and suggests a strategic listing price range.
tasks.expected_outcome: A professional and persuasive CMA report is created.
